New Records: Shakib Al Hasan became the first batter to score more than 2,500 runs in men's T20Is for Bangladesh
Key Match Events: Shakib Al Hasan hit 64 not out after getting to a 38-ball fifty
Bangladesh posted 159 in their quota of 20 overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shakib Al Hasan became only the sixth Asian batter to complete 2,500 runs in T20I cricket
